newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo Disneyland operator may list in Dec -- sources.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo Disneyland operator may list in Dec -- sources.

text.p: Oriental Land Co Ltd, the operator of Tokyo Disneyland, is likely to go public on the Tokyo Stock Exchange in mid-December, brokerage officials said on Monday.

"It hasn't been decided officially, but we hear that it (the listing) will be in mid-December and that details of the listing will be announced in the beginning of December," said a source at a medium-sized brokerage involved in the listing.
A fund manager at an investment trust company said the fine print concerning Oriental Land's listing had been discussed last week and that the likely date for the listing was December 11.
Oriental Land officials declined to comment. The company has said in the past that it wants to list its shares, but has not yet announced any specific plans.
"In anticipation of the listing, shares in Keisei Electric Railway Co Ltd and Mitsui Fudosan Co Ltd may attract investors," a broker said.
Mitsui and Keisei Electric are Oriental Land's largest shareholders.

As of 0559 GMT, Keisei Electric, the seventh most heavily traded issue, was down 30 yen at 1,140 with a 2.52 million turnover. Mitsui, ranking 11th, was down 30 yen at 1,470 yen with a volume of 2.16 million shares.
